headline.main: WPB IS OUTGROWTH OF DEFENSE SET-UP; Nelson Agency Had Genesis in Advisory Commission Which Began Work in May, 1940

lead_paragraph: The War Production Board, which is directing the mobilization of American industry for war, was established by President Roosevelt on Jan. 16, 1942, to assure "the most effective prosecution of war procurement and war production." Donald M. Nelson was named as chairman.
